titleStmt.title: To the supreme authority the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England some considerations about the excise of 4s. 8d. per barrell upon sope, humbly offered by the sope-makers of London, who lately presented their petition to your Honors.
titleStmt.author: Hayes, John.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Hayes [and 19 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
